attributes.action: Offer free presciptions for preventative diseases, where hereditary or developed, and not self inflicted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the see free prescriptions for kidney disease sufferers. Those that are not self inflicted (ie smoking, drinking, etc). If we don't have preventative medication, we need dialysis or transplants, and become an extra drain on the economy as we are unable to work, etc and health care costs then increase.
